item.text: So Jacob moved on and came to the land of the eastern people.

He <st data-num="07200 02009">saw</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="07704" class="">field</st> a <st data-num="0875" class="">well</st> <st data-num="02009 08033">with</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="05739" class="">flocks</st> of <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st> <st data-num="07257" class="">lying</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">beside</st> it, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> the <st data-num="05739" class="">flocks</st> were <st data-num="08248" class="">watered</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="0875" class="">well</st>. Now<n id="3" /> a <st data-num="01419" class="">large</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">covered</st> the <st data-num="06310" class="">mouth</st> of the <st data-num="0875" class="">well</st>.
When all the flocks were gathered there, the shepherds would roll the stone off the mouth of the well and water the sheep. Then they would put the stone back in its place over the well’s mouth.
Jacob asked them, “My brothers, where are you from?” They replied, “We’re from Haran.”

So he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to them, “Do you <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st>, the <st data-num="01121" class="">grandson</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="05152" class="">Nahor</st>?” “We <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> him,”<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>.

“Is he <st data-num="07965" class="">well</st>?”<n id="1" /> Jacob <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st>. They <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “He is <st data-num="07965" class="">well</st>.<n id="2" /> Now <st data-num="02009" class="">look</st>, here <st data-num="0935" class="">comes</st> his <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st>.”

Then Jacob<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="02005" class="">Since</st> it is <st data-num="05750" class="">still</st> <st data-num="01419" class="">the middle of</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>,<n id="2" /> it is <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> for the <st data-num="04735" class="">flocks</st> to be <st data-num="0622" class="">gathered</st>. You should <st data-num="08248" class="">water</st> the <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st> and then <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> and let them <st data-num="07462" class="">graze</st> some more.”<n id="3" />
“We can’t,” they said, “until all the flocks are gathered and the stone is rolled off the mouth of the well. Then we water the sheep.”
While he was still speaking with them, Rachel arrived with her father’s sheep, for she was tending them.

<st data-num="01961 0834">When</st> <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st>, the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> of his <st data-num="0251 0517">uncle</st> <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st> of his <st data-num="0251 0517">uncle</st> <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st>, <st data-num="03290" class="">he</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="05066" class="">went over</st><n id="3" /> and <st data-num="01556" class="">rolled</st> the <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">off</st> the <st data-num="06310" class="">mouth</st> of the <st data-num="0875" class="">well</st> and <st data-num="08248" class="">watered</st> the <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st> of his <st data-num="0251 0517">uncle</st> <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st>.<n id="4" />

Then <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="05401" class="">kissed</st> <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st> and began to <st data-num="01058" class="">weep</st> <st data-num="05375 06963">loudly</st>.<n id="1" />

When <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> <st data-num="05046" class="">explained</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> was a <st data-num="0251" class="">relative</st> of her <st data-num="01" class="">father</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588 01931">and</st> the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="07259" class="">Rebekah</st>, she <st data-num="07323" class="">ran</st> and <st data-num="05046" class="">told</st> her <st data-num="01" class="">father</st>.

When <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">heard</st> this <st data-num="08088" class="">news</st> about <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st>, his <st data-num="0269" class="">sister’s</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>, he <st data-num="07323" class="">rushed out</st> to <st data-num="07125" class="">meet</st> him. He <st data-num="02263" class="">embraced</st> him and <st data-num="05401" class="">kissed</st> him and <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> him <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>. Jacob<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05608" class="">told</st> <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> <st data-num="03605 01697 0428">how he was related to him</st>.<n id="2" />
Then Laban said to him, “You are indeed my own flesh and blood.” So Jacob stayed with him for a month.
Then Laban said to Jacob, “Should you work for me for nothing because you are my relative? Tell me what your wages should be.”

(Now <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> had <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughters</st>;<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="01419" class="">older one</st> was <st data-num="08034" class="">named</st> <st data-num="03812" class="">Leah</st>, <st data-num="08034" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="06996" class="">younger one</st> <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st>.

<st data-num="03812" class="">Leah’s</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st> were <st data-num="07390" class="">tender</st>,<n id="1" /> but <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">had</st> a <st data-num="03303" class="">lovely</st> <st data-num="08389" class="">figure</st> and <st data-num="03303" class="">beautiful</st> <st data-num="04758" class="">appearance</st>.)<n id="2" />

Since <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> had <st data-num="0157" class="">fallen in love with</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st>, he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “I’ll <st data-num="05647" class="">serve</st> you <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="08141" class="">years</st> in exchange for your <st data-num="06996" class="">younger</st> <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st>.”

<st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “I’d <st data-num="02896" class="">rather</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> her to you <st data-num="05414" class="">than</st> to <st data-num="0312" class="">another</st> <st data-num="0582" class="">man</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03427" class="">Stay</st> <st data-num="05978" class="">with</st> me.”
So Jacob worked for seven years to acquire Rachel. But they seemed like only a few days to him because his love for her was so great.
Finally Jacob said to Laban, “Give me my wife, for my time of service is up. And I want to sleep with her.”

So <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> <st data-num="0622" class="">invited</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0582" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> of that <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">prepared</st> a <st data-num="04960" class="">feast</st>.

In the <st data-num="01961 06153">evening</st> he <st data-num="03947 0935">brought</st> his <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> <st data-num="03812" class="">Leah</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> Jacob,<n id="2" /> and he <st data-num="0935" class="">slept</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> her.<n id="3" />
(Laban gave his female servant Zilpah to his daughter Leah to be her servant.)
In the morning Jacob discovered it was Leah! So Jacob said to Laban, “What in the world have you done to me? Didn’t I work for you in exchange for Rachel? Why have you tricked me?”

“It is <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> our <st data-num="06213 03651">custom</st> <st data-num="04725" class="">here</st>,”<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “to <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> the <st data-num="06810" class="">younger</st> daughter in marriage<n id="2" /> <st data-num="06440" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="01067" class="">firstborn</st>.
Complete my older daughter’s bridal week. Then we will give you the younger one too, in exchange for seven more years of work.”
Jacob did as Laban said. When Jacob completed Leah’s bridal week, Laban gave him his daughter Rachel to be his wife.

(<st data-num="03837" class="">Laban</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> his <st data-num="08198" class="">female servant</st> <st data-num="01090" class="">Bilhah</st> to his <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> <st data-num="07354" class="">Rachel</st> to be her <st data-num="08198" class="">servant</st>.)<n id="1" />
Jacob slept with Rachel as well. He also loved Rachel more than Leah. Then he worked for Laban for seven more years.
When the Lord saw that Leah was unloved, he enabled her to become pregnant while Rachel remained childless.
So Leah became pregnant and gave birth to a son. She named him Reuben, for she said, “The Lord has looked with pity on my oppressed condition. Surely my husband will love me now.”
She became pregnant again and had another son. She said, “Because the Lord heard that I was unloved, he gave me this one too.” So she named him Simeon.
She became pregnant again and had another son. She said, “Now this time my husband will show me affection, because I have given birth to three sons for him.” That is why he was named Levi.
She became pregnant again and had another son. She said, “This time I will praise the Lord.” That is why she named him Judah. Then she stopped having children.
